metadataAttributes.Title: The Business of Health Care Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Advance your career in health care management. Develop business skills and understand the American health care system to improve cost and quality.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Richard Lambert ,Christopher D. Ittner ,Ezekiel J. Emanuel, MD, PhD ,Guy David, PhD ,Michael Useem ,Peter Cappelli ,Christian Terwiesch ,Amol S. Navathe, MD, PhD ,David A. Asch, MD, MBA ,Roy Rosin, MBA ,Kevin Volpp, MD, PhD ,
